steps: decided to get in better shape
make a list of healthy foods
tape the paper with the regime to the fridge
do exercises off the list each day
track fitness progress with an app
buy the healthy foods each week
modify regime and diet based on results

branching_info.branching_step: buy the healthy foods each week
branching_info.option 1: order healthy foods from wholefoods.com and get them delivered to you
branching_info.option 2: go to grocery store every other day to get fresh foods
